Apply to work with us

Autosaving...

Use the form on this page to apply for a job at St George’s.

Select the job you’re applying for.

Before you begin

This form features an autosave function which reduces the chance of you losing data if you navigate away from the page during completion, however we cannot be held responsible for any loss of data incurred while completing the form so we strongly encourage you to write out all longer answers in a text editor or word processor and copy them into the form when complete.

We encourage you to look through the form to familiarise yourself with all questions before beginning to complete it. This will help you understand what information is best suited where, and should allow you to estimate the time it will take you to complete the form.

Your name and contact details
Diversity

St George’s Lupset Ltd is an equal opportunities employer. All applicants will be considered on the basis of suitability for the post, regardless of sex, race, marital status, religion, disability, or sexual orientation. Answering the questions below allows us to monitor our commitment to being an equal opportunities employer.

The details given in this section are confidential and will not be considered in any way during the appointment process.

Ethnic origin is not about nationality, place of birth or citizenship. It is about the group to which you perceive you belong.

Safeguarding Children and Vulnerable Adults

This position involves working with vulnerable groups and we will therefore conduct appropriate safeguarding measures. This will include an enhanced Disclosure and Barring Service check (DBS).


A criminal record will not automatically bar you from working with us, however not disclosing criminal convictions could lead to the rejection of your application, or your dismissal if discovered after your appointment.

Have you ever been convicted of an offence? *

You must declare any convictions, cautions, reprimands or final warnings that are not “protected” as defined by the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974 (Exceptions) Order 1975 (as amended in 2013).

Next
Describe your suitability for the role

Tell us what experience, skills and abilities you can bring to the job. Match your skills to the person specification, and include skills gained from paid or voluntary work, or through family and leisure activities.

Present or most recent employment

Only if you’ve already left this role

Can we contact this person for a reference before an interview?
Previous employment

Please give details of all your previous jobs since leaving school/college in date order, starting with the most recent. Any gaps in your employment history must also be included. Please do not include student placements here, these should be included in the next section.

Previous employment $$$

References

References may relate to current or previous employment, or to voluntary or student placements. Character references may be submitted providing they are not from family members.

Please obtain permission from your references before indicating we can contact them

First referee

Your first referee should be your present employer or, if you are not employed at present, your previous employer. Only if you have never been in paid employment or have recently left education should you choose an alternative first reference

Can we contact this person for a reference before an interview?

At least one reference must be available prior to interview, and you will not be able to start work until we have received two references.

Second referee

Can we contact this person for a reference before an interview?

At least one reference must be available prior to interview, and you will not be able to start work until we have received two references.

Education

Please provide details of your formal education, including any schools, colleges and universities attended. Training or short courses should not be listed here; include them in the next section.

Training and short courses

Include any additional training you think is relevant to the role here.

Declaration of accuracy

Confirm that you’re human

This helps us prevent spam or other automated applications.

Print or keep a copy of your application

We strongly recommend saving a copy of your application before submitting. Clicking the button below will allow you to print your application. On many computer systems this will also include an option to save the application as a PDF on your computer.
